DOC.brief_title: Supporting Baby Behavior Through Pediatric Offices
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective project evaluate impact infant growth infant-feeding practice low-cost series video training tools target medical staff design support ongoing Baby Behavior education WIC participant . The intervention , currently use California WIC agency , teach caregiver recognize understand healthy infant behavior range infant cue common pattern sleep cry . This project also evaluate acceptance , knowledge transfer , use tool health care provider medical staff . It expect trained staff prepare share Baby Behavior message patient information deliver quickly easily well-baby visit .
DOC.criteria: Will attend participate pediatric clinic wellbaby visit Primiparous , singleton pregnancy Currently enrol WIC At least 18 year age Speaks read English Spanish Has telephone access internet Plans stay area 6 month birth infant Abstained smoke pregnancy Exclusion criterion : Gave birth 37 week gestation She and/or infant health condition ( ) know health risk contraindicate breastfeed She and/or infant health condition ( ) know health risk impact infant growth development
